short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension mutes the ads on JioCinema for IPL 2024

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mutes while the advertisement plays in the jiocinema browser tab.
Unmutes iteslf automatically when the game resumes.
Works for the Tata IPL 2024 live stream cricket (Indian Premier League).
